RelatedSentence: President Park Geun-hye issued a statement on Monday , 34 days after the ferry Sewol sank off the southwestern coast .
President Park Geun-hye issued a statement on Monday , 34 days after the ferry Sewol sank off the southwestern coast .
She took responsibility for the government 's mishandling of the worst maritime disaster in decades , saying , Ultimate responsibility for the poor response to this incident lies with me .

She also offered an apology in her nationally televised address for all the suffering people endured .
